entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Fight your way to the Blackscale Gates.  Be watchful for Captain Beshk, he is always on guard.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: You wish to call out the Captain of the Guard? Then I will answer your call. Prepare yourselves!
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Defeat Captain Beshk and use his pass key to enter the compound
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Now that you have defeated Captain Beshk you may enter the Slavers Compound.
